definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Just as if some one was kissing the window all over outside.
sentences.chinese: 就好像有人从外面把窗子吻了个遍。

sentences.english: The church's east window has beautifully coloured glass.
sentences.chinese: 教堂朝东的窗子是用精美的彩色玻璃镶嵌成的。

sentences.english: The windows glinted in the sun.
H shut the window with such force that the glass broke.
sentences.chinese: 他关窗子用了那么大的劲，玻璃都碎了。

sentences.english: The criminal cut the iron bar with a saw and ran away.
sentences.chinese: 锯断了窗子上的铁条，逃走了。

sentences.english: The rich scent of rain and wet earth was blowing through the open window.
sentences.chinese: 雨水和湿土那厚重的味道透过敞开的窗子袭面而来。

sentences.english: The shop is fitted with rolling shutters.
sentences.chinese: 那商店的窗子装有可卷动的遮板。

sentences.english: It was getting darker. The rain was beating on the windows. The wind was rising.
sentences.chinese: 天正慢慢黑下来，大雨拍打着窗子，外面开始起风了。

sentences.english: The wind is blowing hard; please see to that all the windows are fastened properly.
sentences.chinese: 刮大风了，请务必把所有的窗子都关好。

sentences.english: Even the smudged windows framed a night so black that I could see nothing there but my own pale face.
sentences.chinese: 脏兮兮的窗子一片黑暗，只能映出我苍白的脸。

sentences.english: The chamber was lighted by the fire on the hearth and the twilight falling through the window.
sentences.chinese: 房间利用火炉的光和从窗子透进来的黄昏天色来照明。

sentences.english: Our apartment is on the sixteenth floor, its window overlooking Daming Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们的公寓在第十六楼，从窗子里可以俯瞰大明湖。

sentences.english: There was no large window in the room, and the chestnut windows were all wooden.
sentences.chinese: 屋子没有大窗口，那栗色的窗子又一律是木格的。

sentences.english: His bedroom has two south-facing windows.
sentences.chinese: 他的卧室有两个朝南的窗子。

sentences.english: The windows were large with easy to use push button blinds.
sentences.chinese: 窗子很大，按钮式调整百叶窗。

sentences.english: The snow is even with the window.

definition: window/the opening panel of a window
car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
